document.full_text: the u.s. postal service is in such bad financial condition that it may not be able to make a payment for future retiree health benefits due september 30, postmaster general patrick donahoe said on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. postal service in dire financial straits: postmaster
lines_and_colors: the u.s. postal service is in such bad financial condition that it may not be able to make a payment for future retiree health benefits due september 30, postmaster general patrick donahoe said on tuesday.
